item.title: John Doe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Since our collaboration, HostCluster has provided us with the best result for solving te chnical problems and optimize our Website performance. Team is supported by excellent customer service, with fast reaction time, always listening to our needs and problems. Our server issues are always resolved quickly, and they’re always available to help us. We are pleased to partner with HostCluster.

item.title: Laura Lopez
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: We’ve been using HostCluster Communications for our Canadian server needs for more than 3 years. Technical communications are polite, informed, informative, and fast. Resolution of extremely rare issues is always fast. Find them to be pro-active rather than reactive. Our server issues are always resolved quickly, and they’re always available to help us. We are pleased to partner with HostCluster.

Slider Revolution

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

An innovative, responsive WordPress Slider that displays your content the beautiful way.The visual,Drag & Drop Editor will let you tell your own stories in no time !

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="60px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1529404567034{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Advanced Theme Options

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Advanced theme options help you customize each and every elements of the website. This helps you create website based on business ,blog and unlimited categories.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="60px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner gap="35" css=".vc_custom_1520254734451{margin-right: 5px !important;margin-bottom: 5px !important;margin-left: 5px !important;}" el_class="box-features"][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1529404576930{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

One-Click Importer

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

The best feature of this plugin is, that theme authors can define import files in their themes and so all you (the user of the theme) have to do is click on the “Import Demo Data” button.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="60px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1529404584466{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

+900 Google Fonts

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

All fonts are released under open source licenses. You can use them in any non-commercial or commercial project. With so many unique fonts to use, you’re bound to find something.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="60px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1529404592353{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Custom icon Loader

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

If you want to load and reconcile data from a unique data source, you can create custom loader types. You can use an existing loader type as a template for a new loader type.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="60px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner gap="35" css=".vc_custom_1520255047633{margin-right: 5px !important;margin-bottom: 5px !important;margin-left: 5px !important;}" el_class="box-features"][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1529404622181{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Easy Documentation

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

HostCluster includes a simple and clean documentation for each and every element step by step you can check right now. So you can build your website without any huddles.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="60px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1529404631650{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Speed Optimization

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Writing clean, structures, consisted and smart code means that it can be easily extended by another other developer. Clear comments added on each code.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="60px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1529404639098{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Unlimited Custom Colors

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Take your website to the next level withit minutes without writing a single line of code. lots of content elements and predefined templates are just a small part of all capabilities.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="60px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content" css=".vc_custom_1529404939277{margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://modeltheme.com/mt_hostcluster/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/hostcluster-landing-slider.jpg?id=3079) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}" el_class="footer-landing"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1517829276499{margin-top: 100px !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner css=".vc_custom_1517829285079{margin-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" el_id="heading-footer-landing"]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1529481319502{margin-top: 30px !important;}"]
